title: Gagauzi - John (Book)
description: Gagauz (Gagauz dili, Gagauzca) is a Turkic language spoken by the Gagauz people of Moldova, Ukraine, Russia, and Turkey and it is an official language of the Autonomous Region of Gagauzia in Moldova. Gagauz belongs to the Oghuz branch of Turkic languages, alongside Azerbaijani, Turkmen, and Turkish. Gagauz is a distinct language from Balkan Gagauz Turkish to some degree.

language.name: Gagauz
language.area: Also in Bulgaria, Kazakhstan, Romania, Russian Federation (Europe), Ukraine.
